ygData.subject: Re: A rant
ygData.msgSnippet: I was going to ask FOH to do just that (I wouldn t care if I died, I do that plenty, and this one would be cool).  However because of the LD problems, I won t
ygData.messageBody:
I was going to ask FOH to do just that (I wouldn't care if I died, I do
that plenty, and this one would be cool). However because of the LD
problems, I won't even ask (and I know they would say no,
understandably). I do have screen shots of me fighting all kinds of
exciting creatures (spectres, Sand Giants, dragoons to name a few) I
die every once in awhile doing that, but its worth it...

Heh a group one day that found me amusing, all backed away from an
unlooted (with scythe) spectre, and let me pose over it. I made a print
out of that shot...

Ryan Honeyman wrote:
>
> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> >
> > In either case people like me will never, e-e-e-e-ever kill a dragon.
>
> I'd take you along for the ride. I wouldn't mind watching you die
> a few times ;-) You can bellow at Vox if it makes you feel good. 8)
>
> How's this? We kill it and you can come take a screenshot of yourself
> beside it?
>
> Harmonic, teasing.
>

--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
